translations: n.（尤指骨头或矿物的）薄层，薄片；叶片，花瓣，叶状体；椎板，鳞片（lamina 的复数）

sentences.sentence: When the mixing axis revolve, the laminas can force materials to writhe up and down and double-knead at the same time, so it can mix uniformly in a short time.
sentences.translation: 当搅拌轴旋转时，搅拌叶片强迫物料上下左右翻腾对揉，因而能在短时间内搅拌得非常均匀。

sentences.sentence: The curtain laminas manufactured by the method has archaized effect, thus the tactile sensation and special visual perception of the curtain laminas can be strengthened.
sentences.translation: 由此，本发明所 制成的窗帘叶片将具有复古的效果，用以增加窗帘叶 片的质感与特殊的视觉感受。

sentences.sentence: The common hypotheses of the shell structure aren't alterative in the new finite element method and it finishes the solution through the integral of the different laminas.
sentences.translation: 新单元的计算方法不改变壳体结构的一般假设条件，利用厚度方向分段积分来完成问题的求解，并对层合截锥壳进行计算。
